text: Wojciech Marusarz (born 28 May 1993) is a retired Polish Nordic combined skier. He represented Poland at the 2018 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Poland Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Zakopane Category:Universiade gold medalists for Poland Category:Universiade medalists in nordic combined Category:Competitors at the 2017 Winter Universiade
title: Wojciech Marusarz
